title: BMI Calculator
description: Create a program that takes a person's weight and height as input and calculates their BMI (body mass index) and classifies them as 'underweight', 'normal', 'overweight', or 'obese' based on the following criteria: underweight (BMI < 18.5), normal (18.5 <= BMI < 25), overweight (25 <= BMI < 30), obese (BMI >= 30) using if/else statements
